metadata.name: Potions
metadata.description:
The first of the Five Wizards used to run a shop with different kinds of enchanted potions. People say that he has abandoned it.

_

Once a millennium
Planets align and poles shift
Mountains spit fire and all crops wilt
When comet gives the sign…

Hoy learned Vendors – it’s time for the song!
Hoy agile Vendors – it’s time for the rally! 

Once a millennium 
The Five unite and light the spark
Melt moldavite and summon H2O from matter dark
Add Antarctic fungus and grains of Atlantis… 

Hoy able Vendors – it’s time for the spell!
Hoy reckless Vendors – it’s time for the stunt! 

Once a millennium
Magic turns liquid and legend comes true
Its content Elixir and SWIDΞR its name
Elixir its contents and SWIDΞR its name!

Hoy thirsty Vendors – it’s time for the fire!
Hoy diehard Vendors – it’s time for the spree!
